Or:  Logon the SE and select CPC under “System Management”  Change Management  Query Channel/Crypto Configure Off/On Pending Microcode installation by MCL Bundle target A Bundle is a set of MCLs that are grouped during testing and released as a group on the same date. You can install an MCL to a specific target Bundle level. The System Information window is enhanced to show a summary Bundle level for the activated level, as shown in Figure 10-28.
